content:
Nature One是欧洲最大的露天电子音乐节之一，有来自德国和世界各地的许多著名DJ参加。相比于Mayday音乐节它的影响力没有那么大，也没有那么悠久，在Mayday音乐节举办三年之后才发展起来。但考虑到Mayday音乐节只持续一个晚上，而Nature One持续两个晚上，出席人数也超过了Mayday音乐节。另外，Nature One音乐节从星期四到星期日还有一些较小的活动。

 

概述

Nature One门票价格约为70欧元（截至2010年）。但与Love Oarade不同，唯一对自然的真正损害是掩体山上的草地和用于露营的田野被践踏（音乐节开始的时候，庄稼已经收割完成）。

 

作为一个特殊的景点，周六晚上有烟火表演。

 

音乐节每年持续一个长周末，总是在八月的第一个周末。

 

2004年，该音乐节的出席人数约为53，000人，其中40，000多人利用附近的田野在周末露营（经过Nature One工作人员正式允许和组织）。

 

露营地一直是音乐节的第二场地，有许多业余DJ和一些商业组织的卡车，装载发电机和燃料，与小俱乐部在转盘，扬声器，有时甚至照明进行竞争。有些人要么不愿意，要么无力支付进入音乐节地区的门票，可以用这个来代替周末的音乐节。

 

音乐节有成四个"主楼层"，每个楼层可容纳几千人：

Open Air Floor (mostly Trance)

Century Circus (Techno)

House of House (House, Minimal)

Classic Terminal

 

还有一些较小的区域（2012年，有18个较小的区域），有时由技术俱乐部的工作人员为几百人驻守。整个音乐节位于一个名为"Pydna"的美国导弹基地，该基地现已退役，该基地拥有举办此类节日的所有必要基础设施和空间，总面积为10万平方米（不露营，占地1平方公里以上）。

 

自2002年以来，自然一号得到了拥有毒品信息台的"前夜"明斯特电子报的支持。
contentEn:
Nature One is one of the largest European open air Electronic music festivals, featuring many renowned DJs from Germany and all over the world. In significance it is not as big as Mayday nor as old, having started 3 years later than the Mayday festival. However attendance has surpassed the Mayday, even when one takes into account that the Mayday only lasts one evening, while the Nature One has 2 main evenings with additional smaller events from Thursday till Sunday.

 

Overview

Nature One tickets cost approximately 70 euros (as of 2010). But unlike the Love Parade, the only real damage to nature occurs due to the trampling of the grass on the bunker hills and the fields used for camping (the crops have always been harvested by the time the festival starts).

 

As a special attraction there is a fireworks display on Saturday evening.

 

The festival lasts for one long weekend each year always on the first weekend of August.

 

In 2004 the festival had an attendance of roughly 53,000, with over 40,000 using the nearby fields for camping over the weekend (officially allowed and organized by the Nature One staff).

 

The camping ground has always been the second festival, with many hobby DJs and some commercially organized trucks, loaded with generators and fuel, the equipment rivaling small clubs in turntables, loudspeakers and sometimes even lighting. Some people who are either unwilling or unable to pay for admission to the festival area use this fact to have a cheaper alternative festival weekend.

 

The festival itself is structured into four "main floors" each for a few thousand:

  • Open Air Floor (mostly Trance)
  • Century Circus (Techno)
  • House of House (House, Minimal)
  • Classic Terminal

 

There are also a few smaller areas (in 2012, there are 18 smaller areas), sometimes manned by techno club crews for a few hundred. The whole thing is located at a US missile base called "Pydna", now decommissioned, which has all necessary infrastructure and space for this kind of festival, a total of 100 000 m² (without camping, which takes up more than 1 km²).

 

Since 2002 Nature One is supported by eve&rave Münster e.V. with drug-information-desks.

 

References

  1. ^ nature-one.de - Review Archived 2012-07-22 at the Wayback Machine
remarks:

name: Nature One
descriptions: Nature One是欧洲最大的露天电子音乐节之一，有来自德国和世界各地的许多著名DJ参加。相比于Mayday音乐节它的影响力没有那么大，也没有那么悠久，在Mayday音乐节举办三年之后才发展起来。但考虑到Mayday音乐节只持续一个晚上，而Nature One持续两个晚上，出席人数也超过了Mayday音乐节。另外，Nature One音乐节从星期四到星期日还有一些较小的活动。
holdAddress: missile base Pydna near Kastellaun, Germany
